weather.question: I fall from the sky but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of frozen water.
⛄ You can build me into a man.
🌨️ I fall during winter.

weather.question: I'm yellow and hot and shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I help plants grow.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🔥 I can make you feel very warm.

weather.question: I make the trees sway, and the kites fly high. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I am invisible.
🌬️ I can be gentle or strong.
🪁 Sailors need me to sail their boats.

weather.question: I'm water falling from the sky. You need an umbrella when I'm near. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I can make puddles.
☔ I make the plants grow.
🌧️ I often come from clouds.

weather.question: I'm a big white thing floating in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain.

hints.text: ☁️ I am made of water droplets.
🐑 I look like fluffy sheep.
⛈️ Lightning can come from me.

weather.question: I am a bright flash in the sky during a storm, followed by a loud noise.

hints.text: ⚡ I am electricity.
⛈️ I am often followed by thunder.
💡 I am very bright.

weather.question: I'm a loud boom you hear after you see lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I travel slower than light.
💥 I can be very scary.
🌩️ I always follow a flash of light.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc in the sky, made after rain.

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
🌞 You can see me when the sun shines after rain.
🍀 People say there's gold at the end of me.

weather.question: I am frozen raindrops, falling from the sky. Ouch!

hints.text: 🧊 I am small balls of ice.
🤕 I can hurt if I hit you.
🌧️ I fall during a storm.

weather.question: I am a storm with very strong winds that spin around and around. I form over warm ocean water.

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the center.
🌊 I can cause a lot of damage.
🌪️ I am called a cyclone in some places.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and like to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I love to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈 I purr when you pet me.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🐕 I am a good friend to humans.
🎾 I love to play in the park.

animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🪿 My babies are called ducklings.
🌿 I like to eat weeds.
🦆 I have webbed feet.

animal.question: I moo and give milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐮 I live on a farm.
🌱 I like to eat grass.
🥛 We get cheese from my milk.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I like to eat peanuts.
🥜 I am the largest land animal.
🚿 I use my trunk to shower myself.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I am a type of horse.
🌿 I like to eat grass.
⚫ My stripes help me camouflage.

animal.question: I am known as the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🥩 I like to eat meat.
👑 I roar loudly.

animal.question: I hop and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I live in Australia.
🦵 I have very strong legs.
🦘 My baby is called a Joey.

animal.question: I am a reptile with a hard shell on my back. I'm slow, but steady. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can live for a very long time.
🥬 I love to eat leafy greens.
🏖️ Some live on land, and some live in the sea.

animal.question: I live in the Arctic and have a thick layer of blubber to keep me warm. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I swim in icy water.
🐟 I like to eat fish.
🐻‍❄️ I am white to blend in with the snow.
